name: ponglypse
description:
How to play:

  • W-A-S-D to move
  • Click to spawn a ball if you don't have one (the ball lasts while its hitting stuff)
  • Click to hit the ball with your paddle (to the direction your mouse points)
  • Right-click to respawn the ball (you can't respawn the ball every time, there is a delay)

Please play in fullscreen (is a little bit better), and press ESC if you get stuck in the game page.
